name: Amazon - SNS
description: The Sumo Logic App for Amazon SNS is a unified logs and metrics App that provides insights into the operations and utilization of your SNS service. The preconfigured dashboards help you monitor the key metrics by application, platform, and topic name, view the SNS events for activities, and help you plan the capacity of your SNS service.

panels.title: Message Publish Size (Today , Yesterday , Last Week)

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=PublishSize Statistic=Average | avg by account,region,TopicName
#C | timeshift 1d
#C | timeshift 7d
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfMessagesPublished Statistic=Sum | sum
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfNotificationsDelivered Statistic=Sum | sum
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfNotificationsFailed Statistic=Sum | sum
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfMessagesPublished Statistic=Sum | sum by account,region,TopicName
#A | timeshift 1d
#A | timeshift 7d
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfNotificationsDelivered Statistic=Sum | sum by account,region,TopicName
#A | timeshift 1d
#A | timeshift 7d
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfNotificationsFailed Statistic=Sum | sum by account,region,TopicName
#A | timeshift 1d
#A | timeshift 7d
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfMessagesPublished Statistic=Sum | sum by TopicName
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfNotificationsDelivered Statistic=Sum | sum by TopicName
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfNotificationsFailed Statistic=Sum | sum by TopicName
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=PublishSize Statistic=Average | avg
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}}  metric=NumberOfMessagesPublished Statistic=Sum | sum by account,region,TopicName
#A | timeshift 1d
#A | timeshift 7d

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and isBlank(error_code) 
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topicArn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count as event_count

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and !isblank(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topicArn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count as event_count

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topicArn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count by event_status
| sort by _count,event_status asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" 
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topicArn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count by event_name
| sort by _count,event_name asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" 
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| timeslice 1h
| count as eventCount by user, event_name
| transpose row user column event_name
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=NumberOfNotificationsDelivered Statistic=Sum | sum by account,region,TopicName
#A | timeshift 1d

panels.title: Message Publish Size (Today, Yesterday, Last Week)

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} TopicName={{topicname}} metric=PublishSize Statistic=Average | avg by account,region,TopicName
#A | timeshift 1d
#A | timeshift 7d

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" topicArn
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" 
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as request_topic_arn, name nodrop 
| json field=responseElements "topicArn", "name" as response_topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (!isEmpty(request_topic_arn), request_topic_arn, response_topic_arn) as topic_arn
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| where !isEmpty(topic_arn)
| parse field=topic_arn "arn:aws:sns:*:*:*" as topic_region, topic_accountid, topic_name
| timeslice 1h
| count as event_count by _timeslice, topic_name
| transpose row _timeslice column topic_name

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and isBlank(error_code) and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com")
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topicArn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| where !isNull(latitude)

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and !isBlank(error_code) and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com")
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topicArn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| where !isNull(latitude)

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count by event_status
| sort by _count, event_status asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and !isblank(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count as event_count by error_code 
| top 10 error_code by event_count

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, event_status
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values ("Success", "Failure") in event_status
| transpose row _timeslice column event_status

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and !isblank(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count as event_count by event_name
| sort by event_count, event_name asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and !isblank(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| timeslice 1s
| count as event_count by _timeslice, event_name, error_code, error_message, region, src_ip, accountid, user, type
| sort by _timeslice

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and isBlank(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count as event_count by event_name
| sort by event_count, event_name asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" and isBlank(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "topicArn", "name" as topic_arn, name nodrop 
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| timeslice 1s
| count as event_count by _timeslice, event_name, region, src_ip, accountid, user, type, request_id, name, topic_arn, user_agent
| sort by _timeslice
| limit 100

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop
| where event_source = "sns.amazonaws.com" 
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "type", "arn", "userName"  as accountid, type, arn, username nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop 
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count as event_count by user
| top 10 user by event_count

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop

| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| count as event_count by user, event_name
| transpose row user column event_name

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" topicArn
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop

| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| where !isEmpty(topic_arn)
| parse field=topic_arn "arn:aws:sns:*:*:*" as topic_region, topic_accountid, topic_name

| top 10 topic_name by event_count, topic_name asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop

| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user

| transpose row _timeslice column event_name

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" topicArn
| json "userIdentity", "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "eventType", "recipientAccountId", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "requestID", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as userIdentity, event_source, event_name, region, src_ip, user_agent, event_type, recipient_account_id, requestParameters, responseElements, request_id, error_code, error_message nodrop

| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(username), user, username) as user
| where !isEmpty(topic_arn)

| count as event_count by topic_name, event_name
